slide.title: Gettext
slide.blurb: Gettext is a LGPL library that attempts to solve the problem of internationalization in a manner that allows translators and developers to work together.

list.title: Pros
list.bullet: Simple for both developers and programmers
Excellent in architecture size for small to medium translations
Very well integrated into the Unix system

list.title: Cons
list.bullet: Still not good for large translations
Requires a bit of legwork, such as compiling translations
